    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
AS Roma triumphed over Genoa in a thrilling Serie A encounter that saw the hosts secure a narrow 3-2 victory. The match, held at the Stadio Olimpico, provided fans with an exhilarating display of football, replete with intricate play, clinical finishing, and moments of sheer individual brilliance.

From the onset, the match promised excitement. AS Roma kicked off proceedings but promptly found themselves on the back foot. Within the first minute, Genoa showed their intent with a shot on target, and by the second minute, they had capitalized on their early pressure. A swift attack culminated in a goal for Genoa, the ball finding the back of the net much to the shock of the home crowd. It was a tremendous start for the visitors and a demonstration that they had come prepared to challenge their more illustrious opponents.

After conceding, AS Roma immediately sought to re-establish control. They kicked off again and tried to settle into a rhythm, but the intensity of the game ensured that play was continuously broken up. There were frequent throw-ins and stoppages within the opening ten minutes as both teams battled for supremacy.

AS Roma's first significant breakthrough came in the 9th minute when they tested Genoa’s defense with two successive shots on target leading to a goal, bringing the score to 1-1. The equalizer reignited the stadium, and AS Roma fans were treated to the sight of their players pressing forward with renewed vigor.

Amid the intense contest, AS Roma's Emerson required medical attention, leading to an enforced substitution in the 17th minute. His injury was serious enough for Mario Rui to replace him, providing an unexpected challenge for Luciano Spalletti to amend his game plan.

Despite the early setback and a round of disruptions, AS Roma exhibited resilience. Edin Dzeko, in particular, was a thorn in Genoa's side as Eugenio Lamanna was forced into action to thwart his attempts. Dzeko's endeavor was reflected in multiple goal attempts, several on target but often denied by Genoa’s resolute defending and Lamanna’s impressive goalkeeping.

AS Roma continued to press, with notable contributions from Stephan El Shaarawy who narrowly missed the target on occasion. The interplay between AS Roma’s midfield and attack was a constant threat to Genoa, who were summoned into defense more often than they would have liked. Genoa’s sporadic counterattacks were equally dangerous and they managed to get shots off target as well, testifying to the end-to-end nature of the contest.

The final moments of the first half saw a flurry of activity. Radja Nainggolan had a series of efforts on goal from the edge of the box which were either blocked or narrowly missed the target. Their endeavors culminated in a series of corners taken by Daniele De Rossi. Despite their numerous attempts, the teams went into halftime tied at 1-1 after the contenders were held at bay by the defenses.

The second half commenced with Genoa kicking off and immediately resumed the frenetic pace of play that characterized the first half. AS Roma looked to turn their possession into a decisive lead but the visitors proved resilient. Early substitutions by Genoa indicated a strategic shift as Nikola Ninkovic replaced Raffaele Palladino, providing more dynamism upfront.

Both sides continued to trade chances. Edin Dzeko had several opportunities to put AS Roma ahead early in the second half, but his efforts either narrowly missed or were saved. Genoa, on their part, managed a few notable shots on target forcing AS Roma keeper Wojciech Szczesny into some critical saves.

By the 28th minute, AS Roma's persistence paid off when Daniele De Rossi found the net. A brilliantly laid pass from Dzeko allowed De Rossi to shoot from close range into the bottom right corner, leaving Genoa’s Lamanna helpless. This goal ignited the passion of the home supporters as AS Roma took a 2-1 lead.

However, the lead was short-lived. Genoa responded quickly, and by the 33rd minute, Darko Lazovic connected with a pass to head home an equalizer, making it 2-2. The Genoa contingent celebrated as their team showed remarkable spirit in fighting back.

The final phase of the game was a gripping contest with both teams throwing everything into securing a win. The tactical battles and substitutions, especially AS Roma's introduction of Diego Perotti, added complexity to the game. Ivan Juric, Genoa's manager, also responded with strategic changes including the replacement of Pietro Pellegri with Olivier Ntcham.

In the 44th minute, a game-defining moment occurred. Diego Perotti received a meticulously crafted pass inside the box and calmly slotted the ball into the bottom right corner. This beautifully executed goal, changing the scoreboard to 3-2 in favor of AS Roma, showcased Perotti's clinical precision and justified his late introduction.

The emotional intensity of the game saw Diego Perotti receive a yellow card shortly after due to an altercation, underlining the high stakes and pressure of the match. As the clock ran down, Genoa sought to rally one last time but AS Roma’s defense, bolstered by the passionate home support, held firm.

Late into the added time, Edin Dzeko was also booked, serving as another testament to the charged atmosphere on the pitch. Both teams continued to compete fiercely until the final whistle, marking the conclusion of an enthralling encounter.

In the end, AS Roma emerged victorious, their resilience and clinical finishing allowing them to edge out a determined Genoa side. The match was a quintessential display of football's unpredictable and dramatic nature, delivering a spectacular contest replete with memorable moments and captivating action.
